name: nus-crypto-exchange
description: A simulated crypto exchange for educational use

scripts.clean: sudo rm -rf nce-backend && sudo rm -rf nce-matchingengine && sudo rm -rf nce-frontend
scripts.pull: git clone https://github.com/sheshenk/nce-backend.git && git clone https://github.com/sheshenk/nce-frontend.git && git clone https://github.com/KeithZHIJIAN/nce-matchingengine.git
scripts.matchingengine: cp ../.env nce-matchingengine/ && cd nce-matchingengine && python3 init.database.py && screen python3 main.py && python3 init.orderbook.py && cd ..
scripts.backend: cd nce-backend && npm install && screen npm start && cd ..
scripts.frontend: cd nce-frontend && npm install && screen npm start && cd ..
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run pull && npm run matchingengine && npm run backend && npm run frontend
scripts.production: npm run clean && npm run pull && rm -rf nce-frontend && npm run matchingengine && npm run backend

author: Pitchappan & Zhi Jian
